alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 6:10PM CDT until March 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN CEDAR...DUBUQUE...JONES... DELAWARE...NORTHEASTERN LINN AND WESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 609 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Edgewood to near Clarence, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lowden, Massillon Park, Wheatland, Lost Nation, Calamus, Colesburg, Toronto, Walnut Grove Park, Holy Cross, Luxemburg, Balltown and Waupeton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Iowa. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
